department: PPWC (Public Works and Government Services - Quebec)
short_summary: The objective of this project is to rehabilitate the lighting system in Rockcliffe Park
description: The project involves the rehabilitation of the lighting system in Rockcliffe Park. The scope of work includes the installation of new lighting poles, removal and replacement of existing lighting fixtures, and electrical repairs. The contractor will be responsible for the installation of new electrical wiring, lighting control systems, and equipment
